text:
Valentina Beatovic-Dobmann 
Newtonstraße 11c, 12489 Berlin, Germany 
phone: +49 176 70036920, e-mail: VBDobmann@web.de 
 
 
 
Personal Profile 
Experienced in Government affairs and advocacy in the field of circular economy and 
recycling for an American chemical company in the political arena in Berlin; driving pro-active 
advocacy to federal and state governments as well as through trade associations.  
 
 
Work Experience 
11/2008 – present  Specialist Government Affairs, Government Affairs  
    Germany, Dow Deutschland Inc ., Berlin 
Advocacy work in circularity and plastics recycling 
technologies, business support, monitoring German legislation, 
coordination with European Government Affairs Team 
 
10/2005 – 12/2005  Student Intern at the Political Department, Representation
